trans-unit.source: NEXT VALUE FOR

trans-unit.source: sequence generators

seg-source.mrk: sequence generators

target.mrk: sequence generators

trans-unit.source: obtaining next value

seg-source.mrk: obtaining next value

target.mrk: obtaining next value

trans-unit.source: The NEXT VALUE FOR expression retrieves the next value from a sequence generator that was created with a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatesequence.dita#rrefsqljcreatesequence"></xref>.

seg-source.mrk: The NEXT VALUE FOR expression retrieves the next value from a sequence generator that was created with a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatesequence.dita#rrefsqljcreatesequence"></xref>.

target.mrk: The NEXT VALUE FOR expression retrieves the next value from a sequence generator that was created with a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatesequence.dita#rrefsqljcreatesequence"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Syntax

seg-source.mrk: Syntax

target.mrk: Syntax

trans-unit.source: NEXT VALUE FOR sequenceName

seg-source.mrk: NEXT VALUE FOR sequenceName

target.mrk: NEXT VALUE FOR sequenceName

trans-unit.source: If this is the first use of the sequence generator, the generator returns its START value. Otherwise, the INCREMENT value is added to the previous value returned by the sequence generator. The data type of the value is the dataType specified for the sequence generator.

seg-source.mrk: If this is the first use of the sequence generator, the generator returns its START value.
Otherwise, the INCREMENT value is added to the previous value returned by the sequence generator.
The data type of the value is the dataType specified for the sequence generator.

target.mrk: If this is the first use of the sequence generator, the generator returns its START value.
Otherwise, the INCREMENT value is added to the previous value returned by the sequence generator.
The data type of the value is the dataType specified for the sequence generator.

trans-unit.source: If the sequence generator wraps around, then one of the following happens:

seg-source.mrk: If the sequence generator wraps around, then one of the following happens:

target.mrk: If the sequence generator wraps around, then one of the following happens:

trans-unit.source: If the sequence generator was created using the CYCLE keyword, the sequence generator is reset to its START value.

seg-source.mrk: If the sequence generator was created using the CYCLE keyword, the sequence generator is reset to its START value.

target.mrk: If the sequence generator was created using the CYCLE keyword, the sequence generator is reset to its START value.

trans-unit.source: If the sequence generator was created with the default NO CYCLE behavior, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> throws an exception.

seg-source.mrk: If the sequence generator was created with the default NO CYCLE behavior, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> throws an exception.

target.mrk: If the sequence generator was created with the default NO CYCLE behavior, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> throws an exception.

trans-unit.source: In order to retrieve the next value of a sequence generator, you or your session's current role must have USAGE privilege on the generator.

seg-source.mrk: In order to retrieve the next value of a sequence generator, you or your session's current role must have USAGE privilege on the generator.

target.mrk: In order to retrieve the next value of a sequence generator, you or your session's current role must have USAGE privilege on the generator.

trans-unit.source: A NEXT VALUE FOR expression may occur in the following places:

seg-source.mrk: A NEXT VALUE FOR expression may occur in the following places:

target.mrk: A NEXT VALUE FOR expression may occur in the following places:

trans-unit.source: <xref href="rrefsqlj41360.dita#rrefsqlj41360">SELECT statement</xref>: As part of the expression defining a returned column in a SELECT list

seg-source.mrk: <xref href="rrefsqlj41360.dita#rrefsqlj41360">SELECT statement</xref>: As part of the expression defining a returned column in a SELECT list

target.mrk: <xref href="rrefsqlj41360.dita#rrefsqlj41360">SELECT statement</xref>: As part of the expression defining a returned column in a SELECT list

trans-unit.source: <xref href="rrefsqlj11277.dita#rrefsqlj11277">VALUES expression</xref>: As part of the expression defining a column in a row constructor (VALUES expression)

seg-source.mrk: <xref href="rrefsqlj11277.dita#rrefsqlj11277">VALUES expression</xref>: As part of the expression defining a column in a row constructor (VALUES expression)

target.mrk: <xref href="rrefsqlj11277.dita#rrefsqlj11277">VALUES expression</xref>: As part of the expression defining a column in a row constructor (VALUES expression)

trans-unit.source: <xref href="rrefsqlj26498.dita#rrefsqlj26498">UPDATE statement</xref>; As part of the expression defining the new value to which a column is being set

seg-source.mrk: <xref href="rrefsqlj26498.dita#rrefsqlj26498">UPDATE statement</xref>; As part of the expression defining the new value to which a column is being set

target.mrk: <xref href="rrefsqlj26498.dita#rrefsqlj26498">UPDATE statement</xref>; As part of the expression defining the new value to which a column is being set

trans-unit.source: Only one NEXT VALUE FOR expression is allowed per sequence per statement.

seg-source.mrk: Only one NEXT VALUE FOR expression is allowed per sequence per statement.

target.mrk: Only one NEXT VALUE FOR expression is allowed per sequence per statement.

trans-unit.source: The NEXT VALUE FOR expression is not allowed in any statement which has a DISTINCT or ORDER BY expression.

seg-source.mrk: The NEXT VALUE FOR expression is not allowed in any statement which has a DISTINCT or ORDER BY expression.

target.mrk: The NEXT VALUE FOR expression is not allowed in any statement which has a DISTINCT or ORDER BY expression.

trans-unit.source: The next value of a sequence generator is not affected by whether the user commits or rolls back a transaction which invoked the sequence generator.

seg-source.mrk: The next value of a sequence generator is not affected by whether the user commits or rolls back a transaction which invoked the sequence generator.

target.mrk: The next value of a sequence generator is not affected by whether the user commits or rolls back a transaction which invoked the sequence generator.

trans-unit.source: A NEXT VALUE expression may not appear in any of these situations:

seg-source.mrk: A NEXT VALUE expression may not appear in any of these situations:

target.mrk: A NEXT VALUE expression may not appear in any of these situations:

trans-unit.source: CASE expression

seg-source.mrk: CASE expression

target.mrk: CASE expression

seg-source.mrk: WHERE clause

target.mrk: WHERE clause

seg-source.mrk: ORDER BY clause

target.mrk: ORDER BY clause

seg-source.mrk: Aggregate expression

target.mrk: Aggregate expression

trans-unit.source: ROW_NUMBER function

seg-source.mrk: ROW_NUMBER function

target.mrk: ROW_NUMBER function

seg-source.mrk: DISTINCT select list

target.mrk: DISTINCT select list

trans-unit.source: Examples

seg-source.mrk: Examples

target.mrk: Examples

trans-unit.source: VALUES (NEXT VALUE FOR order_id);

seg-source.mrk: VALUES (NEXT VALUE FOR order_id);

target.mrk: VALUES (NEXT VALUE FOR order_id);

trans-unit.source: INSERT INTO re_order_table SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE back_order = 1;

seg-source.mrk: INSERT INTO re_order_table SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE back_order = 1;

target.mrk: INSERT INTO re_order_table SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE back_order = 1;

trans-unit.source: UPDATE orders SET oid = NEXT VALUE FOR order_id WHERE expired = 1;

seg-source.mrk: UPDATE orders SET oid = NEXT VALUE FOR order_id WHERE expired = 1;

target.mrk: UPDATE orders SET oid = NEXT VALUE FOR order_id WHERE expired = 1;
